TermDefinition.DefinitionText: The main sensory nerve of the head and face, and the motor nerve of the muscles used in chewing. Also called trigeminal nerve.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "fifth cranial nerve"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "quinto par craneal"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Nervio sensorial principal de la cabeza y el rostro, y nervio motor de los músculos usados para masticar. También se llama nervio trigémino.
